title: Blockchain Fundamentals
description: An introduction to blockchain technology, its principles, and applications in modern industries.
summary: This course covers the fundamentals of blockchain, including decentralized networks, smart contracts, and consensus mechanisms.

modules.title: Introduction to Blockchain
modules.content: Learn what blockchain is, how it works, and why it's revolutionary.
modules.learn: Blockchain is a decentralized ledger that records transactions across multiple nodes. The key properties include decentralization, transparency, and immutability.

modules.title: Cryptography & Security
modules.content: Understand hash functions, digital signatures, and cryptographic principles used in blockchain.
modules.learn: Blockchain uses cryptographic techniques like SHA-256 hashing and elliptic curve digital signatures to ensure security and integrity.

modules.title: Consensus Mechanisms
modules.content: Learn how blockchains achieve agreement without a central authority.
modules.learn: Consensus mechanisms like Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS) ensure that all transactions are verified before being added to the blockchain.

modules.title: Smart Contracts & DApps
modules.content: Explore Ethereum, Solidity, and the development of decentralized applications (DApps).
modules.learn: Smart contracts are self-executing agreements stored on a blockchain. They eliminate intermediaries and automate processes.

title: Solidity for Smart Contracts
description: A hands-on course on Solidity programming to develop Ethereum smart contracts.
summary: Master Solidity, learn best practices, and build secure smart contracts.

modules.title: Basics of Solidity
modules.content: Learn about Solidity syntax, data types, and control structures.
modules.learn: Solidity is a statically-typed programming language for writing smart contracts on Ethereum.

modules.title: Functions & Events
modules.content: Understand Solidity functions, modifiers, and event logging.
modules.learn: Functions define smart contract behavior, while events allow external applications to listen for changes on the blockchain.

modules.title: Smart Contract Security
modules.content: Learn common security vulnerabilities and best practices.
modules.learn: Reentrancy attacks, integer overflows, and improper access control are some of the security issues that developers must handle.

modules.title: Deploying Smart Contracts
modules.content: Understand how to compile and deploy contracts using Remix and Hardhat.
modules.learn: The contract must be compiled into bytecode and deployed using tools like Web3.js or Ethers.js.

title: EDU-Chain (Open Campus) Blockchain Development
description: Learn how to build blockchain-based education platforms using EDU-Chain (Open Campus).
summary: Explore decentralized education systems, tokenized learning, and on-chain certificate verification.

modules.title: Decentralized Education on Blockchain
modules.content: Understand how blockchain can revolutionize the education industry.
modules.learn: EDU-Chain leverages blockchain to create an immutable ledger for academic credentials.

modules.title: Tokenized Learning
modules.content: Learn how token incentives can enhance student engagement.
modules.learn: By issuing tokens for completing courses, students are rewarded for learning efforts, enabling gamification of education.

modules.title: On-Chain Certification
modules.content: Explore how blockchain can store academic records securely.
modules.learn: Certificates are stored on the blockchain as tamper-proof records, making it easier for employers to verify credentials.

modules.title: Building DApps for Education
modules.content: Learn to develop decentralized applications for education.
modules.learn: DApps for education use smart contracts to automate tasks such as enrollment, grading, and credential verification.

title: Machine Learning for Beginners
description: Learn the fundamentals of Machine Learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning.
summary: This course introduces ML concepts like regression, classification, and neural networks.

modules.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
modules.content: Overview of ML concepts and real-world applications.
modules.learn: Machine Learning enables computers to learn from data using algorithms such as supervised learning and unsupervised learning.

modules.title: Supervised Learning
modules.content: Understand linear regression, decision trees, and support vector machines.
modules.learn: Supervised learning uses labeled data to train models for classification and regression tasks.

modules.title: Unsupervised Learning
modules.content: Explore clustering techniques and anomaly detection.
modules.learn: Unsupervised learning finds hidden patterns in data using methods such as k-means clustering and hierarchical clustering.

modules.title: Neural Networks & Deep Learning
modules.content: Learn about artificial neural networks and backpropagation.
modules.learn: Deep learning models such as CNNs and RNNs are used for complex tasks like image recognition and natural language processing.

title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
description: Learn how to protect systems from cyber threats and become an ethical hacker.
summary: This course covers penetration testing, network security, and cryptography.

modules.title: Penetration Testing Basics
modules.content: Understand how ethical hacking is performed legally to secure systems.
modules.learn: Penetration testing involves simulating cyber-attacks to identify vulnerabilities.

modules.title: Network Security
modules.content: Learn how to secure networks against cyber threats.
modules.learn: Firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and VPNs help prevent unauthorized access to networks.

modules.title: Malware Analysis
modules.content: Understand different types of malware and how they spread.
modules.learn: Viruses, worms, and ransomware are common forms of malware that exploit system vulnerabilities.

modules.title: Cryptography & Secure Communications
modules.content: Learn how encryption keeps data safe.
modules.learn: Cryptographic techniques like AES, RSA, and ECC ensure secure communication over the internet.
